product_name: REI Sahara Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Get out for those mid-season hikes in the REI Sahara plus-size shirt. Made from quick-drying nylon, this shirt helps keep you cool and comfortable on warm, sunny days. Easy-care, lightweight micro-ripstop nylon wicks moisture, dries incredibly fast and delivers very good sun protection with a 40 UPF rating. Moisture-wicking polyester mesh lines the collar stand, shoulder yoke and side-seam vents. Vent across back yoke allows cooling airflow. Hidden zippered vents at side seams enhance airflow; vents are strategically placed so they won't get in the way of pack straps. Style-enhancing shirttail hem and front and back princess seams. Hidden zippered pocket stows credit cards and currency. Relaxed fit maximizes comfort without compromising your look.
short_description: Get out for those mid-season hikes in the REI Sahara plus-size shirt. Made from quick-drying nylon, this shirt helps keep you cool and comfortable on warm, sunny days.
